articles.title: Indians In Kenya Asked To Limit "Non-Essential" Movement Amid Violent Protests - NDTV
articles.description: India has advised its citizens in Kenya to exercise utmost caution and restrict non-essential movement amid violent protests in the East African nation against the government's proposed tax hikes.
articles.content:
At least five protestors were shot dead and more than 200 others injured in Nairobi. (File)

articles.title: New mpox strain in DR Congo 'most dangerous yet' - BBC.com
articles.description: A current outbreak of the virus in the African country is "concerning", say health officials.
articles.content:
By Philippa Roxby, Health reporter
Mpox, formerly called monkeypox, is a viral infection and can be deadly
